PhD Candidate
Department of Mathematics
Tufts University

I like thinking about topics realated to outer automorphisms of free groups and mapping classes of surface diffeomorphisms. I’m curious about geometric topology, geometric group theory, Teichmüller theory, tropical geometry, orbifolds, etc.
Curriculum Vitae: PDF

I am graduating! My advisor is Kim Ruane. In the fall I will be a postdoc at Rutgers University Newark.
